Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Jackson
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are rerouted via Central, Madison, Laramie, Harrison, Terminal then resume route on Central, due to police activity near Central/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Madison, Laramie, Harrison, Terminal then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Central/Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Cicero
